meanings.sent1: I misestimate the time it takes to finish my homework.
meanings.sent2: She tends to misestimate the distance to the park.
meanings.sent3: Don't misestimate how long it will take to bake the cookies.
meanings.sent4: His misestimation of the project's cost led to budget issues.
meanings.sent5: It's easy to misestimate the weight of the package without a scale.

meanings.sent1: The misestimate of the crowd size caused confusion.
